oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relics including two canteens from Shiloh
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Civil War relics including two canteens found at Shiloh and part of a harmonica, a clasp knife, buttons, bullets, part of a spur, and a thimble. The Battle of Shiloh was fought April 6-7, 1862 along the Tennessee River.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Musical instruments; Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
